name: Neck Rotation
description: Slowly rotate your head in a circular motion to improve neck mobility and reduce stiffness.

name: Chin Tucks
description: Gently pull your chin back, creating a double chin, to strengthen deep neck flexors.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
description: Move between arching and rounding your back to improve spinal flexibility.

name: Knee-to-Chest Stretch
description: Pull one or both knees to your chest while lying down to stretch lower back muscles.

name: Bridge Exercise
description: Lift your hips off the ground while lying on your back to strengthen glutes and core.

name: Shoulder Rolls
description: Roll your shoulders forward and backward in circular motions to relieve tension.

name: Wall Angels
description: Stand with your back against a wall and move your arms in an arc motion.

name: Pendulum Swings
description: Lean forward and let your arm hang, then gently swing it in small circles.

name: Straight Leg Raises
description: Lie down and lift one straight leg at a time to strengthen quadriceps without bending the knee.

name: Heel Slides
description: Slide your heel toward your buttocks while lying down to improve knee flexion.

name: Quadriceps Stretch
description: Pull your foot toward your glutes while standing to stretch the front of your thigh.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
description: Lunge forward with one leg to stretch the hip flexor of the back leg.

name: Clamshells
description: Lie on your side and lift your top knee while keeping feet together to strengthen hip abductors.

name: Figure-Four Stretch
description: Cross one ankle over the opposite knee and gently press down to stretch the hip.

name: Ankle Alphabet
description: Trace the alphabet with your big toe by moving your ankle in all directions.

name: Calf Raises
description: Rise up onto your toes and lower back down to strengthen calf muscles.

name: Ankle Circles
description: Rotate your ankle in circular motions in both directions to improve mobility.
